article: as the ad wars turned sharply to character issues thursday , bob dole 's campaign appeared to abandon hopes of winning the key states of new jersey , connecticut , pennsylvania and new hampshire as it halted all tv advertising aimed at viewers there .
abstract: dole ad push skips # states ; clinton ads feature james brady
